Plot Module-Score Trajectories Across Pseudotime

Source: R/plot_module_trajectories.R
plot_module_trajectories.Rd

Computes and plots module scores for specified communities and genes along pseudotime.

Usage

plot_module_trajectories(
  comm_results,
  seurat_obj,
  bin_index,
  comm_indices = NULL,
  custom_modules = NULL,
  cluster_field = "RNA_snn_res.0.1",
  cluster_id = "1",
  assay = "RNA",
  title = "Module-Score Trajectories"
)

Arguments

comm_results

A list of community detection results from detect_communities_across_bins.

seurat_obj

A Seurat object containing pseudotime and cluster metadata.

bin_index

Integer, index of the pseudotime bin to use (e.g., 2 for PT2).

comm_indices

Integer vector, indices of communities to plot (default: NULL, uses all communities).

custom_modules

A named list of custom gene sets to plot (default: NULL; if provided, overrides comm_indices).

cluster_field

Character, metadata field for cluster IDs (default: "RNA_snn_res.0.1").

cluster_id

Character, cluster ID to filter cells (default: "1").

assay

Character, assay to use for module scoring (default: "RNA").

title

Character, title of the plot (default: "Module-Score Trajectories").

Value

A ggplot object.
